name: Space Defender (IvanMota)
description:
Space Defender

   Space shooter game written entirely in pure JavaScript and rendered on HTML5 canvas. In this game you move where you shoot. The objective is to kill as many spaceships as you can while you avoid the projectiles.

Game By: 

  • Ivan Mota

Controls: 

  • Mouse click = aim / shoot / move

Feel free to send me any question, comment or suggestion  to my email:

  • Ivanmtta@gmail.com
